key.name: session-key
key.description: Saves the Last.fm session key to connect to Last.fm.

key.name: connected
key.summary: If the plugin is connected with LastFM or not.
key.description: Determines if the plugin is actually connected with LastFM or not. It's also used as communication medium between the config dialog and the plugin itself to manage the connection.

key.name: extensions
key.summary: Construction to save extensions' specific settings. Initially, all extension should define a 'enabled' key to determine if it should be enabled or not.
